bibl.title: P. Cair. Zen. 4.59532 - Two Epitaphs for a Hunting Dog Called Tauron.
bibl.note: P. Cairo Zenon IV, 59532 (= Pack2 1761). Realism in a description of a certain event is no reason alone for assuming that an epigram was inscribed on stone.
bibl.seg: PUROLA Tiina, P. Cair. Zen. 4.59532 - Two Epitaphs for a Hunting Dog Called Tauron.
P. Cairo Zenon IV, 59532 (= Pack2 1761). Realism in a description of a certain event is no reason alone for assuming that an epigram was inscribed on stone.
